offer: RESTRICTED TO SMOKERS 21 YEARS OF AGE OR OLDER

survey.name: Doral & Co.
survey.eligibility: To be eligible to receive Doral & Co., complete the following survey.
survey.signature_and_birthdate_required: YOUR SIGNATURE & BIRTHDATE ARE REQUIRED TO DETERMINE YOUR ELIGIBILITY.
survey.eligibility_statement: I am a smoker 21 years of age or older.

participation.product_offers: Doral product offers like the Doral & Co. Free
participation.current_mailing_address: Attach current mailing address and attach it here.

identification.required: Attach photocopy of your official identification here.
identification.note: Copying some forms of official identification is prohibited in some states. If you are in one of these states, please copy one of the other forms of official identification.
